name: Teammate Asks for Help
summary: A colleague needs your help while you're busy with your own work

scenarioTemplate.setup: You're focused on {yourTask} when you get a message from a teammate.
scenarioTemplate.message: Hey! Sorry to interrupt - I've been stuck on {theirProblem} for a couple hours now. I've tried a few things but can't figure it out. Would you have time to help me take a look?

responseOptions.label: Drop everything to help
responseOptions.description: Sure, let me stop what I'm doing. Share your screen!
responseOptions.evaluationNotes: Helpful but may sacrifice your own deadlines

responseOptions.label: Decline to help
responseOptions.description: Sorry, I'm too busy right now. Maybe ask someone else?
responseOptions.evaluationNotes: May harm team relationships and leaves colleague stuck

responseOptions.label: Schedule time to help
responseOptions.description: I'd be happy to help! I'm in the middle of something right now - can I ping you in about an hour when I hit a stopping point?

responseOptions.label: Give a quick pointer
responseOptions.description: I can't dive deep right now, but quick thought: have you checked [specific thing]? That's usually the culprit. If that doesn't help, let's sync in an hour.
responseOptions.evaluationNotes: Provides immediate value while managing time

responseOptions.label: Point to resources
responseOptions.description: I remember hitting something similar! Check out [docs/slack thread/wiki page] - that helped me. If you're still stuck after, ping me and we'll debug together.
responseOptions.evaluationNotes: Empowers learning while offering backup support

evaluationCriteria.question: Did they try to help their teammate?
Did they balance helping with their own work?
Did they respond kindly and clearly?
Did they empower the teammate to learn?

followUpTemplates.message: That would be great, thanks! I'll keep poking at it in the meantime. Just ping me whenever you're free.
Oh I didn't think of that! Let me check... Actually that might be it! I'll try it and let you know. Thanks!
Perfect, I'll check that out. Thanks for the pointer! I'll reach out if I'm still stuck.
Oh you don't have to stop everything! But if you have a minute, that would be amazing.

fintech.specificMessage: Hey, I'm stuck on this Stripe webhook - it's not triggering correctly. I've checked the signature but something's off. Any ideas?

healthcare.specificMessage: I'm trying to integrate with the FHIR API but the auth flow is confusing. Could you walk me through how you set it up?

ecommerce.specificMessage: I can't get the local environment to connect to the staging database. I followed the docs but getting connection refused. Help?
